fields.notesFormatted:
1. As citizens of a new kingdom we learn a new language

    Do I tear down or build up with my language?

  2. The Holy Spirit is our language teacher.

    Ephesians 4:30; 1:13-14

    Do I talk in a way that acknowledges God is present?

Take Home Test

Ephesians 4:13-14

Part 1

  • Do I have bitterness in my life?
  • Do I have rage in my life?
  • Do I have anger in my life?
  • Do I have brawling in my life?
  • Do I have slander in my life?
  • Do I have malice in my life?

Part 2

  • Where can I show more kindness in my life?
  • Where can I show more compassion in my life?
  • Where can I show more forgiveness in my life?
